Package civitas.celestis.util

package civitas.celestis.util

Util

This package contains various utility class including data structures and utility interfaces.

There are two main data structures within this package: SafeArray and Tuple. Safe arrays define the contract for a type-safe array, while tuples define the contract for a shallowly immutable dataset.

See Also:

  • Tuple

    A fixed-size tuple which can only hold two elements.

    A thread-safe implementation of a grid.
    ThreadedModule
    Defines the contract for modules which control one or more threads.

    Unique<K>
